resources.string: Welcome to the world of Mario
Application developed by Ana Rodríguez González. Version 1.0.
The hero of the Mushroom Kingdom. He is a brave and loyal plumber who fights Bowser to rescue Princess Peach.
Mario\'s younger brother, known for being a bit timid but very skilled.
Princess of the Mushroom Kingdom, often captured by Bowser, though she also joins adventures and helps Mario.
The King of the Koopas and Mario\'s arch-nemesis. He constantly tries to kidnap Princess Peach to rule the Mushroom Kingdom.
Princess of Sarasaland and a good friend of Peach. She is energetic and competitive.
A loyal servant of the Mushroom Kingdom and a friend of Mario. He often provides help and information to Mario and his friends.
A friendly dinosaur who assists Mario in his adventures. He is known for his long tongue and his ability to lay eggs.
Mario\'s rival, known for being greedy and somewhat selfish. He has great strength and loves competing in sports and gambling games.
Wario\'s companion and friend. He is Luigi\'s eternal rival and is known for his sarcastic personality.
The guardian of the Lumas and the Comet Observatory. She has great knowledge of the universe and magical abilities.
Bowser\'s son. He often tries to impress his father by causing trouble and fighting Mario.
A mischievous ghost that appears in many of Bowser\'s castles. It usually attacks when the player is not looking.
A powerful gorilla and the leader of the Kongs. Originally an enemy of Mario, he is now one of his allies.
A close friend and adventure companion of Donkey Kong. He is agile and has many acrobatic abilities.
Super jump, fireball throwing, Super Mario transformation, flying with the cape
Super jump, ghost-catching skills with the Poltergust vacuum, Super Luigi transformation
Floating in the air, heart-throwing, magical abilities
Fire throwing, superhuman strength, creating minions, transformation power
Speed, great endurance, knowledge of the Mushroom Kingdom
Long tongue to catch enemies, egg throwing, super jump
Superhuman strength, motorcycle skills, bomb throwing, super punch
Sports skills, bomb throwing, athletic abilities
Cosmic powers, levitation, telekinesis, controlling Lumas
Fire throwing, using a magic brush, combat skills
Invisibility, passing through walls, scaring enemies
Super strength, barrel throwing, great endurance, powerful jumps
Jetpack skills, peanut throwing, agility and acrobatics
